title: Olives Baked in Red Wine
directions: Preheat oven to 325Â°F. Combine olives, wine, fennel seeds, sliced garlic and olive oil in small baking dish. Bake uncovered until olives are heated through, about 20 minutes. Cool slightly. Serve olives warm.
ingredients: 1 cup unpitted Kalamata olives or other brine-cured black olives
